column5: A buddy e-mailed me this earlier today.  The new “Pending” Archery Ontario moose record.  A big Soo bruiser!   http://sootoday.com/content/news/full_stor...oryNumber=43553
i don't know much about the moose scoring system. perhaps someone could share it with us non hunters.  what would this moose weigh in at??
I watched that youtube video of it being harvested,amazing how close they got to him!Thanks for posting!
The scoring system is the antlers.  It could be a small body but still be the world record because of its antlers. A big bull could be pushing over 1200 pounds.
I think he was closer to 1400 pounds
Sad to watch such a beautiful beast take his last breath.  (Obviously a non-hunter's perspective).
I actually just watched that video for the first time.  This is an older video.  I think it's been posted on here before.  Wups  Still a nice bull though, and a cool video.
ya this has been posted before but nobody said anything about any record! thats sweet and sault boys to!!
WOW.... SIMPLY AMAZING...... THAT IS A HUNTERS DREAM COME TRUE, CONGRAT'S TO THE HUNTERS ON A TROPHY OF A LIFETIME.
